commands.description: Add specified member to community role and send welcome/information message
Displays information on a random crystal, or on a crystal you specify.
Search the psychedelic directory for organizations, therapists, clinical trials, and other resources
Show bot information and commands available to you
Search the psychedelic library catalogue for a given query related to academic or cultural texts and media
Register your location and gain access to the meetups role/channel
Display nonviolent communication guidelines for servers
Roll dice in d20 and other increments
Display a list of safety topics, or view safety information pertaining to a specific topic.
Display information on the psychedelic library torrent
Get a random video from a playlist, or don't specify one for a list of playlists
View the collection of cognitive and dialectival behavioral therapy worksheets.
Assign a temporary role to yourself (Sibyl-moderated servers only).
